alert.note: Alert for Garza; Lynn (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lubbock (Lubbock and South Plains Texas)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 07 at 10:21PM CDT by NWS Lubbock
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Lynn and southwestern Garza Counties through 1045 PM CDT... At 1020 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 4 miles northwest of O`Donnell, or 13 miles southwest of Tahoka, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Tahoka, O`Donnell and Grassland. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
